content.raw:
As far as I can tell, `jsoncpp` does not install a cmake config-file (even though it does allow you to build and install with cmake). I would recommend removing this, because it could be a misleading indication that we are actually expecting a config-file for `jsoncpp`.

If `jsoncpp` starts providing a config-file in the future, we can revisit this.
content.html:
As far as I can tell, jsoncpp does not install a cmake config-file (even though it does allow you to build and install with cmake). I would recommend removing this, because it could be a misleading indication that we are actually expecting a config-file for jsoncpp.

If jsoncpp starts providing a config-file in the future, we can revisit this.
